hero.title: We're at the Beginning of Something
hero.subtitle: We want to build companies that share what they earn. For that, we need good products. Good products need good people. Right now, we're looking for those people.

whatWeDo.title: What Are We Doing Now?
whatWeDo.subtitle: The invisible work. Building systems, designing processes.
whatWeDo.description: BulutLabs will be a technology platform. But first, people who think, build, and question will come together. The rest will follow.

howWeWork.title: How Will We Work?
howWeWork.subtitle: Part of what we earn will go to helping others earn. But first, we need to earn.

model.label: Part of Profit Goes Back
model.title: Sustainable Model
model.description: If we succeed, that success will be shared. With foundations, projects, people. But to do that, we need to succeed first. We'll get there with you.

joinUs.title: We Want to Build This With You
joinUs.subtitle: This isn't a job posting. This is an invitation to know you.

comingSoon.title: We Don't Do Standard Applications
comingSoon.description: Instead of sending a CV and waiting, let's talk. Let's hear who you are, what you want, why you want to be here.

ai.title: The Curious
ai.description: Curious about technology, AI, new things. Love learning, questioning.

builders.title: The Makers
builders.description: Prefer doing over talking. Code, design, create.

thinkers.title: Success + Meaning Seekers
thinkers.description: Just making money isn't enough. Need to do something meaningful too.

Career.title: We Don't Hire. We Come Together.
Career.description: Instead of CVs or resumes, we believe in ideas, potential, and passion. Choose the question below that speaks to you the most and share your thoughts with us.

thinkers.title: For Thinkers
thinkers.question: If there was one thing that could change how technology interacts with society, what would it be and why?

builders.title: For Builders
builders.question: Tell us about a small project or prototype you're proud of and what you learned from it. Share a link if possible (GitHub, etc.).

ai_enthusiasts.title: For AI Enthusiasts
ai_enthusiasts.question: What excites you most about current developments in AI and how do you imagine it could be used for social good?

contact.title: Start the Conversation
contact.description: Did one of the questions above interest you? Or do you just want to say hello? We'd love to hear your thoughts.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.subtitle: You can write to ask questions, give suggestions, or just say hello.

careers.title: I Want to Join
careers.description: To join the team, to meet
